message.content: {"given_definition_quality":90,"better_definition":"to teach","sentence":"老师教学生。","image_prompt":"A teacher standing in front of two children in a classroom setting, pointing at a board, soft apocalypse animation style—gentle, surreal lighting, slightly dreamy atmosphere, faded colors, a sense of quietness despite subtle signs of change outside classroom windows.","sentence_translation":"The teacher teaches students."}
